dialogue.speaker: Dogbert
dialogue.text: GOSH. I THOUGHT "HECK" WAS JUST A FIGURE OF SPEECH.

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: YEAH. A LOT OF PEOPLE THINK THEY CAN GET AWAY WITH MINOR INFRACTIONS.

dialogue.speaker: Pointy-Haired Boss
dialogue.text: ACCORDING TO MY RECORDS, LAST MONTH YOU DELIBERATELY ASKED FOR THREE LITTLE KETCHUPS AT MCDONALD'S WHEN YOU KNEW YOU ONLY NEEDED TWO.

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: I KNEW THAT WOULD COME BACK TO HAUNT ME. LOOK, I STILL HAVE THE EXTRA ONE. I'LL GIVE IT BACK!
